meanings.definition: A port that can accommodate multiple connections or devices.
meanings.sent1: The computer had a multiport for connecting the printer, scanner, and mouse.
meanings.sent2: I need a multiport to plug in all my electronic gadgets.
meanings.sent3: The multiport was so busy, it felt like a tiny city with all the devices coming and going.
meanings.sent4: Her multiport mind could handle various tasks simultaneously.
meanings.sent5: The multiport on the router resembled a bustling hub of activity.

meanings.definition: To equip with multiple ports for connecting devices.
meanings.sent1: I will multiport the new computer to ensure all peripherals can be connected.
meanings.sent2: She multiports all her devices to the docking station for easy access.
meanings.sent3: The tech wizard multiported the system with lightning speed, impressing everyone.
meanings.sent4: He multiports his communication channels to stay connected at all times.
meanings.sent5: The engineer multiports the network to enhance efficiency and connectivity.

meanings.definition: Having multiple ports for connecting devices.
meanings.sent1: The multiport hub allowed for seamless connection of various devices.
meanings.sent2: She preferred laptops with multiport capabilities for flexibility.
meanings.sent3: The multiport adapter was like a Swiss Army knife for electronic connections.
meanings.sent4: His multiport smartphone made it easy to link to different accessories.
meanings.sent5: The multiport setup simplified the process of plugging in multiple devices.
